member.name: T:Voltaic.ClientConnectedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for client connection events. Contains information about the connection establishment including the connection endpoint and timestamp.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ClientConnectedEventArgs.ConnectedUtc
member.summary: Gets the timestamp when the connection was established (UTC).

member.name: P:Voltaic.ClientConnectedEventArgs.Endpoint
member.summary: Gets the connection endpoint (e.g., "localhost:8080" for TCP, "http://localhost:8080" for HTTP, "ws://localhost:8080" for WebSocket).

member.name: P:Voltaic.ClientConnectedEventArgs.ConnectionType
member.summary: Gets the connection type identifier (e.g., "TCP", "HTTP", "WebSocket", "Stdio").

member.name: M:Voltaic.ClientConnectedEventArgs.#ctor(System.String,Voltaic.ClientConnectionTypeEnum)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The connection endpoint.
The connection type.

member.name: T:Voltaic.ClientConnection
member.summary: Represents a connected client with its associated resources and metadata. Supports multiple connection types: TCP, WebSocket, HTTP, and Stdio.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ClientConnection.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of client connection.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ClientConnection.SessionId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier or session ID for this client connection.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ClientConnection.LastActivity
member.summary: Gets the timestamp of the last activity on this connection. Updated when notifications are enqueued or dequeued.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ClientConnection.MaxQueueSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of notifications that can be queued. When the limit is reached, oldest notifications are discarded. Default is 100 notifications. Minimum is 1.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ClientConnection.TcpClient
member.summary: Gets the underlying TCP client. Only applicable for TCP connection types.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ClientConnection.Stream
member.summary: Gets the network stream for reading and writing data. Only applicable for TCP connection types.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ClientConnection.WebSocket
member.summary: Gets the underlying WebSocket instance. Only applicable for WebSocket connection types.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ClientConnection.TokenSource
member.summary: Gets the cancellation token source for this connection.

member.name: M:Voltaic.ClientConnection.#ctor(System.String,System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for TCP connections.
member.param: The unique identifier for this client.
The TCP client connection.
member.exception: Thrown when sessionId is null or empty, or tcpClient is null.

member.name: M:Voltaic.ClientConnection.#ctor(System.String,System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for WebSocket connections.
member.param: The unique identifier for this connection.
The WebSocket instance.
member.exception: Thrown when sessionId is null or empty, or webSocket is null.

member.name: M:Voltaic.ClientConnection.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for HTTP sessions.
member.param: The unique identifier for this session.
member.exception: Thrown when sessionId is null or empty.

member.name: M:Voltaic.ClientConnection.#ctor(System.String,Voltaic.ClientConnectionTypeEnum)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified connection type.
member.param: The unique identifier for this connection.
The type of connection.
member.exception: Thrown when sessionId is null or empty.

member.name: M:Voltaic.ClientConnection.Enqueue(Voltaic.JsonRpcRequest)
member.summary: Enqueues a notification into the queue. If the queue is at maximum capacity, the oldest notification will be discarded.
member.param: The notification to enqueue.
member.exception: Thrown when notification is null.
Thrown when the connection has been disposed.

member.name: M:Voltaic.ClientConnection.DequeueAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously waits for and dequeues a notification from the queue. This method will block until a notification is available or the cancellation token is triggered.
member.param: Cancellation token for the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the dequeued notification, or null if the operation was cancelled.

member.name: M:Voltaic.ClientConnection.DequeueAll
member.summary: Gets all notifications currently in the queue and clears it.
member.returns: A list of all notifications that were in the queue.

member.name: M:Voltaic.ClientConnection.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of notifications currently in the queue.
member.returns: The number of notifications in the queue.

member.name: M:Voltaic.ClientConnection.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

member.summary: Standard input/output connection.

member.name: F:Voltaic.ClientConnectionTypeEnum.Tcp
member.summary: TCP socket connection.

member.summary: HTTP-based connection with Server-Sent Events for notifications.

member.name: F:Voltaic.ClientConnectionTypeEnum.Websockets
member.summary: WebSocket connection.

member.summary: Provides data for client disconnection events. Contains information about the disconnection including timestamp, reason, and connection duration.

member.summary: Gets the timestamp when the disconnection occurred (UTC).

member.summary: Gets the total duration the connection was active.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ClientDisconnectedEventArgs.Reason
member.summary: Gets the reason for disconnection.

member.summary: Gets the connection endpoint (e.g., "localhost:8080" for TCP, "http://localhost:8080" for HTTP, "ws://localhost:8080" for WebSocket).

member.name: P:Voltaic.ClientDisconnectedEventArgs.ConnectionType
member.summary: Gets the connection type identifier (e.g., "TCP", "HTTP", "WebSocket", "Stdio").

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The timestamp when the connection was established (UTC).
The connection endpoint.
The connection type.
The reason for disconnection.

member.summary: Underlying TCP client.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcClient.TokenSource
member.summary: Cancellation token source.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the client is currently connected to a server.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcClient.DefaultContentType
member.summary: Gets or sets the default Content-Type header value used when sending messages. This will default to application/json; charset=utf-8 if the supplied value is null.

member.name: E:Voltaic.JsonRpcClient.Log
member.summary: Occurs when a log message is generated.

member.name: E:Voltaic.JsonRpcClient.NotificationReceived
member.summary: Occurs when a notification (request without an ID) is received from the server.

member.name: E:Voltaic.JsonRpcClient.Connected
member.summary: Occurs when the client successfully connects to a server.

member.name: E:Voltaic.JsonRpcClient.Disconnected
member.summary: Occurs when the client disconnects from the server.

member.name: E:Voltaic.JsonRpcClient.RequestSent
member.summary: Occurs when a request is sent to the server.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcClient.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcClient.ConnectAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously connects to a JSON-RPC server at the specified host and port.
member.param: The hostname or IP address of the server.
The port number to connect to.
Cancellation token for the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result is true if the connection was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcClient.CallAsync``1(System.String,System.Object,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously invokes a remote method and returns the result as the specified type.
member.typeparam: The type to deserialize the result into.
member.param: The name of the method to invoke.
The parameters to pass to the method. Can be null.
The timeout in milliseconds to wait for a response. Default is 30000 (30 seconds).
Cancellation token for the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the method result.
member.exception: Thrown when the client is not connected.
Thrown when the remote method returns an error.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcClient.CallAsync(System.String,System.Object,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously invokes a remote method and returns the result as an object.
member.param: The name of the method to invoke.
The parameters to pass to the method. Can be null.
The timeout in milliseconds to wait for a response. Default is 30000 (30 seconds).
Cancellation token for the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the method result.
member.exception: Thrown when the client is not connected.
Thrown when the remote method returns an error.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcClient.NotifyAsync(System.String,System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously sends a notification to the server. Notifications are fire-and-forget and do not expect a response.
member.param: The name of the notification method.
The parameters to pass with the notification. Can be null.
Cancellation token for the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: Thrown when the client is not connected.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcClient.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects from the server and cancels all pending requests.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcClient.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

member.name: T:Voltaic.JsonRpcError
member.summary: Represents a JSON-RPC 2.0 error object.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcError.Code
member.summary: Gets or sets the error code. Standard error codes are defined by the JSON-RPC 2.0 specification.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcError.Message
member.summary: Gets or sets a short description of the error.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcError.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets additional information about the error. This property is optional and will be omitted from serialization if null.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcError.ParseError
member.summary: Creates a parse error (-32700) indicating that invalid JSON was received by the server.
member.returns: A new JsonRpcError instance representing a parse error.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcError.InvalidRequest
member.summary: Creates an invalid request error (-32600) indicating that the JSON sent is not a valid request object.
member.returns: A new JsonRpcError instance representing an invalid request error.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcError.MethodNotFound
member.summary: Creates a method not found error (-32601) indicating that the method does not exist or is not available.
member.returns: A new JsonRpcError instance representing a method not found error.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcError.InvalidParams
member.summary: Creates an invalid params error (-32602) indicating that the method parameters are invalid.
member.returns: A new JsonRpcError instance representing an invalid params error.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcError.InternalError
member.summary: Creates an internal error (-32603) indicating an internal JSON-RPC error.
member.returns: A new JsonRpcError instance representing an internal error.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcError.#ctor
member.summary: Represents a JSON-RPC 2.0 error object.

member.name: T:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequest
member.summary: Represents a JSON-RPC 2.0 request message.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequest.JsonRpc
member.summary: Gets or sets the JSON-RPC protocol version. Always "2.0".

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequest.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the method to be invoked.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequest.Params
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameters to be passed to the method. This property is optional and will be omitted from serialization if null.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequest.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the request identifier. If null, this is a notification and no response is expected. This property will be omitted from serialization if null.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequest.#ctor
member.summary: Represents a JSON-RPC 2.0 request message.

member.name: T:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequestEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for JSON-RPC request events. Contains information about the client connection, the request, and timing information.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequestEventArgs.Client
member.summary: Gets the client connection that sent the request.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequestEventArgs.Request
member.summary: Gets the JSON-RPC request.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequestEventArgs.ReceivedUtc
member.summary: Gets the timestamp when the request was received (UTC).

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequestEventArgs.RequestId
member.summary: Gets the unique request identifier, if present. Will be null for notifications (requests without an ID).

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequestEventArgs.Method
member.summary: Gets the method name being invoked.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequestEventArgs.IsNotification
member.summary: Gets whether this request is a notification (has no ID and expects no response).

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequestEventArgs.#ctor(Voltaic.ClientConnection,Voltaic.JsonRpcRequest)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The client connection that sent the request.
The JSON-RPC request.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcRequestEventArgs.#ctor(Voltaic.ServerPendingRequest)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from a pending request.
member.param: The pending request state.

member.name: T:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponse
member.summary: Represents a JSON-RPC 2.0 response message.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponse.JsonRpc
member.summary: Gets or sets the JSON-RPC protocol version. Always "2.0".

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponse.Result
member.summary: Gets or sets the result of the method invocation. This property is required on success and will be omitted from serialization if null. Must not be present if there was an error.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponse.Error
member.summary: Gets or sets the error object if there was an error invoking the method. This property is required on error and will be omitted from serialization if null. Must not be present if the method succeeded.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponse.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the request identifier that this response corresponds to. This must match the Id of the request being replied to.

member.name: T:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponseEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for JSON-RPC response events. Contains information about the client connection, the original request, the response, and timing information.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponseEventArgs.Client
member.summary: Gets the client connection that received the response.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponseEventArgs.Request
member.summary: Gets the original JSON-RPC request.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponseEventArgs.Response
member.summary: Gets the JSON-RPC response.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponseEventArgs.ReceivedUtc
member.summary: Gets the timestamp when the request was received (UTC).

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponseEventArgs.SentUtc
member.summary: Gets the timestamp when the response was sent (UTC).

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponseEventArgs.Duration
member.summary: Gets the processing duration from request receipt to response send.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponseEventArgs.RequestId
member.summary: Gets the unique request identifier, if present.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponseEventArgs.Method
member.summary: Gets the method name that was invoked.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponseEventArgs.IsError
member.summary: Gets whether the response contains an error.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponseEventArgs.IsSuccess
member.summary: Gets whether the response was successful (contains a result, not an error).

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponseEventArgs.#ctor(Voltaic.ClientConnection,Voltaic.JsonRpcRequest,Voltaic.JsonRpcResponse,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The client connection that received the response.
The original JSON-RPC request.
The JSON-RPC response.
The timestamp when the request was received (UTC).

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcResponseEventArgs.#ctor(Voltaic.ServerPendingRequest,Voltaic.JsonRpcResponse)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from a pending request.
member.param: The pending request state.
The JSON-RPC response.

member.name: T:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer
member.summary: Provides a TCP-based JSON-RPC 2.0 server implementation for handling remote procedure calls.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.TokenSource
member.summary: Cancellation token source.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.MaxQueueSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of notifications that can be queued per client connection. When the limit is reached, oldest notifications are discarded. Default is 100 notifications. Minimum is 1. This value is applied to new client connections when they are established.

member.name: E:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.Log
member.summary: Occurs when a log message is generated.

member.name: E:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.ClientConnected
member.summary: Occurs when a client connects to the server.

member.name: E:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.ClientDisconnected
member.summary: Occurs when a client disconnects from the server.

member.name: E:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.RequestReceived
member.summary: Occurs when a JSON-RPC request is received from a client.

member.name: E:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.ResponseSent
member.summary: Occurs when a JSON-RPC response is sent to a client.

member.name: P:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.DefaultContentType
member.summary: Gets or sets the default Content-Type header value used when sending messages. This will default to application/json; charset=utf-8 if the supplied value is null.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.#ctor(System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

The port number to listen on.
True to include default methods such as echo, ping, getTime, add, and getClients.

member.summary: Registers a custom RPC method with the specified handler.

The function that handles the method invocation.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.TryInvokeMethod(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Text.Json.JsonElement},System.Object@)
member.summary: Attempts to invoke a registered method by name with the given parameters.
member.param: The name of the method to invoke.
The parameters to pass to the method.
The result of the method invocation if successful.
member.returns: True if the method was found and invoked successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.StartAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Starts the server and begins listening for client connections asynchronously. This method will continue running until Stop() is called.
member.param: Cancellation token for the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Asynchronously broadcasts a notification to all connected _Clients.

Cancellation token for the operation.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.KickClient(System.String)
member.summary: Kicks a client by disconnecting them from the server.

member.returns: True if the client was found and kicked; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.GetConnectedClients
member.summary: Gets a list of all currently connected client IDs.
member.returns: A list of client IDs.

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.Stop
member.summary: Stops the server and disconnects all _Clients.

member.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

member.name: M:Voltaic.JsonRpcServer.RegisterBuiltInMethods
member.summary: Registers the built-in RPC methods: ping, echo, getTime, add, and getClients. This method is virtual to allow derived classes to customize the set of built-in methods.

member.name: T:Voltaic.McpHttpClient
member.summary: Provides an HTTP-based MCP (Model Context Protocol) client implementation. Supports JSON-RPC 2.0 over HTTP with Server-Sent Events (SSE) for server-to-client notifications.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.SessionId
member.summary: Gets the session ID assigned by the server. This ID is used to correlate requests and receive notifications via SSE.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.IsConnected
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the client is currently connected to a server. A client is considered connected if it has a valid session ID.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.IsSseConnected
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the SSE (Server-Sent Events) connection is active.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.RequestTimeoutMs
member.summary: Gets or sets the request timeout in milliseconds. Default is 30000 (30 seconds). Minimum is 1000 (1 second).

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.Log
member.summary: Occurs when a log message is generated.

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.NotificationReceived
member.summary: Occurs when a notification (request without an ID) is received from the server via SSE.

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.Connected
member.summary: Occurs when the client successfully connects to a server.

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.Disconnected
member.summary: Occurs when the client disconnects from the server.

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.RequestSent
member.summary: Occurs when a request is sent to the server.

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.ResponseReceived
member.summary: Occurs when a response is received from the server.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.ConnectAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously connects to an HTTP MCP server at the specified base URL. This method will make an initial request to establish a session.
member.param: The base URL of the server (e.g., "http://localhost:8080").
The RPC endpoint path. Default is "/rpc".
The SSE events endpoint path. Default is "/events".
Cancellation token for the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result is true if the connection was successful; otherwise, false.
member.exception: Thrown when baseUrl is null or empty.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.StartSseAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously starts the Server-Sent Events (SSE) connection to receive notifications from the server. A session must be established before calling this method.
member.param: Cancellation token for the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result is true if the SSE connection was established; otherwise, false.
member.exception: Thrown when no session has been established.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.StopSse
member.summary: Stops the Server-Sent Events (SSE) connection.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.CallAsync``1(System.String,System.Object,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously invokes a remote method and returns the result as the specified type.
member.typeparam: The type to deserialize the result into.
member.param: The name of the method to invoke.
The parameters to pass to the method. Can be null.
The timeout in milliseconds to wait for a response. Default is the value of RequestTimeoutMs property.
Cancellation token for the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the method result.
member.exception: Thrown when the client has not been initialized.
Thrown when the remote method returns an error.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects from the server and stops the SSE connection if active.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpClient.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

member.name: T:Voltaic.McpHttpServer
member.summary: Provides an HTTP-based MCP (Model Context Protocol) server implementation. Supports JSON-RPC 2.0 over HTTP POST with Server-Sent Events (SSE) for server-to-client notifications.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.SessionTimeoutSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the session timeout in seconds. Sessions that have been inactive for longer than this will be expired. Default is 300 seconds (5 minutes). Minimum is 10 seconds.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.MaxQueueSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of notifications that can be queued per client connection. When the limit is reached, oldest notifications are discarded. Default is 100 notifications. Minimum is 1. This value is applied to new client connections when they are established.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.EnableCors
member.summary: Gets or sets whether CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) is enabled. When enabled, the server will accept requests from any origin. Default is true to support browser-based clients.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.CorsHeaders
member.summary: Headers to use when CORS support is enabled.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.TokenSource
member.summary: Gets the cancellation token source for the server.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.ProtocolVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the MCP protocol version. Default is "2025-03-26".

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.ServerName
member.summary: Gets or sets the server name for MCP serverInfo. Default is "Voltaic.Mcp.HttpServer".

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.ServerVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the server version for MCP serverInfo. Default is "1.0.0".

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.Log
member.summary: Occurs when a log message is generated.

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.ClientConnected
member.summary: Occurs when a client connects to the server.

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.ClientDisconnected
member.summary: Occurs when a client disconnects from the server.

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.RequestReceived
member.summary: Occurs when a JSON-RPC request is received from a client.

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.ResponseSent
member.summary: Occurs when a JSON-RPC response is sent to a client.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The hostname to listen on. Use * for any hostname (requires admin or root privileges).
The port number to listen on. Must be between 0 and 65535.
The URL path for JSON-RPC requests. Default is "/rpc".
The URL path for Server-Sent Events connections. Default is "/events".
True to include default MCP methods such as echo, ping, getTime, and getSessions.
member.exception: Thrown when the port is invalid.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.RegisterMethod(System.String,System.Func{System.Nullable{System.Text.Json.JsonElement},System.Object})
member.summary: Registers a custom RPC method with the specified handler.
member.param: The name of the method to register.
The function that handles the method invocation. Receives optional JSON parameters and returns a result object.
member.exception: Thrown when name or handler is null.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.RegisterTool(System.String,System.String,System.Object,System.Func{System.Nullable{System.Text.Json.JsonElement},System.Object})
member.summary: Registers a tool with metadata for MCP protocol tool discovery. This registers both the method handler and the tool definition for tools/list.
member.param: The name of the tool.
A description of what the tool does.
The JSON schema object defining the tool's input parameters.
The function that handles the tool invocation. Receives optional JSON parameters and returns a result object.
member.exception: Thrown when any required parameter is null.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.StartAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Starts the HTTP server and begins listening for requests asynchronously. This method will continue running until Stop() is called or the cancellation token is triggered.
member.param: Cancellation token for the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: Thrown when the server is already running.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.SendNotificationToSession(System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Broadcasts a notification to a specific session. The notification will be queued and delivered via the SSE connection if active.
member.param: The session ID to send the notification to.
The name of the notification method.
The parameters to pass with the notification. Can be null.
member.returns: True if the notification was queued; false if the session does not exist.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.BroadcastNotification(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Broadcasts a notification to all active sessions. Notifications are queued and delivered via SSE connections.
member.param: The name of the notification method.
The parameters to pass with the notification. Can be null.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.GetActiveSessions
member.summary: Gets a list of all active session IDs.
member.returns: A list of session IDs.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.GetConnectedClients
member.summary: Gets a list of all currently connected client IDs.
member.returns: A list of client IDs.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.KickClient(System.String)
member.summary: Kicks a client by disconnecting them from the server.
member.param: The ID of the client to kick.
member.returns: True if the client was found and kicked; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.RemoveSession(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a session and its notification queue.
member.param: The session ID to remove.
member.returns: True if the session was found and removed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpHttpServer.Stop
member.summary: Stops the server and closes all active sessions.

member.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

member.summary: Registers the built-in MCP methods including protocol methods (initialize, tools/list) and utility tools. This method is virtual to allow derived classes to customize the set of built-in methods.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Provides a TCP-based MCP (Model Context Protocol) server implementation for handling remote procedure calls over a network. This class extends JsonRpcServer with MCP-specific defaults and semantics.

member.summary: Gets or sets the MCP protocol version. Default is "2025-03-26".

member.name: T:Voltaic.McpWebsocketsClient
member.summary: Provides a WebSocket-based MCP (Model Context Protocol) client implementation. Supports bidirectional communication with MCP servers over WebSocket connections.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpWebsocketsClient.MaxMessageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum message size in bytes that can be received. Default is 1 MB (1048576 bytes). Minimum is 4096 bytes.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpWebsocketsClient.IsConnected
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the client is currently connected to a server.

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpWebsocketsClient.Log
member.summary: Occurs when a log message is generated.

member.summary: Occurs when a notification (request without an ID) is received from the server.

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpWebsocketsClient.Connected
member.summary: Occurs when the client successfully connects to a server.

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpWebsocketsClient.Disconnected
member.summary: Occurs when the client disconnects from the server.

member.name: E:Voltaic.McpWebsocketsClient.RequestSent
member.summary: Occurs when a request is sent to the server.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpWebsocketsClient.ConnectAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously connects to a WebSocket MCP server at the specified URL.
member.param: The WebSocket URL to connect to (e.g., "ws://localhost:8080/mcp" or "wss://example.com/mcp").
Cancellation token for the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result is true if the connection was successful; otherwise, false.
member.exception: Thrown when url is null or empty.

member.name: M:Voltaic.McpWebsocketsClient.CallAsync``1(System.String,System.Object,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously invokes a remote method and returns the result as the specified type.
member.typeparam: The type to deserialize the result into.

The parameters to pass to the method. Can be null.
The timeout in milliseconds to wait for a response. Default is 30000 (30 seconds).
Cancellation token for the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the method result.
member.exception: Thrown when the client is not connected.
Thrown when the remote method returns an error.

member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Voltaic.McpWebsocketsServer
member.summary: Provides a WebSocket-based MCP (Model Context Protocol) server implementation. Supports bidirectional communication over WebSocket connections with full JSON-RPC 2.0 support.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpWebsocketsServer.MaxMessageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum message size in bytes that can be received. Default is 1 MB (1048576 bytes). Minimum is 4096 bytes.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpWebsocketsServer.KeepAliveIntervalSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the WebSocket keep-alive interval in seconds. Default is 30 seconds. Set to 0 to disable keep-alive.

member.name: P:Voltaic.McpWebsocketsServer.MaxQueueSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of notifications that can be queued per client connection. When the limit is reached, oldest notifications are discarded. Default is 100 notifications. Minimum is 1. This value is applied to new client connections when they are established.

member.summary: Gets the cancellation token source for the server.

member.name: T:Voltaic.MessageFraming
member.summary: Provides LSP-style message framing for JSON-RPC 2.0 messages. Messages are formatted as: Content-Length: {size}\r\n\r\n{json_body}

member.name: M:Voltaic.MessageFraming.ReadMessageAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Reads a complete LSP-framed message from a stream. Handles partial reads, buffering, and multiple messages in the buffer.
member.param: The network stream to read from.
A reusable buffer for reading. Will be resized if needed.
Current offset in the buffer containing unprocessed data.
Number of unprocessed bytes in the buffer.
Cancellation token.
member.returns: A tuple containing the message string, updated buffer (may be resized), and buffer state (offset, count).

member.name: M:Voltaic.MessageFraming.TryExtractMessage(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempts to extract a complete LSP-framed message from a buffer.

member.name: M:Voltaic.MessageFraming.FindHeaderEnd(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds the position of "\r\n\r\n" in the buffer.

member.name: M:Voltaic.MessageFraming.ParseContentLength(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the Content-Length value from the header string.

member.name: M:Voltaic.MessageFraming.WriteMessageAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Writes a message with LSP-style framing to a stream. Supports multiple headers (Content-Length is required, Content-Type is optional).
member.param: The network stream to write to.
The message string (typically JSON) to send.
Optional Content-Type header value. If null, Content-Type header is omitted.
Cancellation token.

member.name: M:Voltaic.MessageFraming.CreateBuffer
member.summary: Creates a buffer for message reading operations.

member.summary: Provides data for request sent events from the client. Contains information about the outbound request including the request details and timestamp.

member.summary: Gets the JSON-RPC request that was sent.

member.summary: Gets the timestamp when the request was sent (UTC).

member.summary: Gets the unique request identifier, if present. Will be null for notifications (requests without an ID).

member.summary: Gets the method name being invoked.

member.summary: Gets the original JSON-RPC request.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ResponseReceivedEventArgs.Response

member.summary: Gets the timestamp when the response was received (UTC).

member.name: P:Voltaic.ResponseReceivedEventArgs.Duration
member.summary: Gets the round-trip duration from request send to response receipt.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ResponseReceivedEventArgs.RequestId
member.summary: Gets the unique request identifier, if present.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ResponseReceivedEventArgs.Method
member.summary: Gets the method name that was invoked.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ResponseReceivedEventArgs.IsError
member.summary: Gets whether the response contains an error.

member.name: P:Voltaic.ResponseReceivedEventArgs.IsSuccess
